title: Zone 0 Luminaires
fullText: Luminaires installed in Zone 0 shall: (a) be compliant with AS/NZS 60598.1 and AS/NZS 60598.2.18; and (b) be supplied by SELV at an output nominal voltage not exceeding 12 V a.c. or 30 V ripple-free d.c.; and (c) not be provided with a protective earthing conductor, in accordance with Clause 5.4.3.
